price: (83) So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; she was of those who remained [with the evildoers].
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-ahlahu illā im'ra-atahu kānat mina al-ghābirīna
